titleStmt.title: Les termes de la ley; or, Certain difficult and obscure words and terms of the common laws and statutes of this realm now in use, expounded and explained Now corrected and enlarged. With very great additions throughout the whole book, never printed in any other impression.
Expositiones terminorum Legum Anglorum. English and French.
titleStmt.author: Rastell, John, d. 1536.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by W. Rawlins, S. Roycroft and M. Flesher, assigns of Richard and Edward Atkins Esquires. For G. Walbanke, S. Heyrick, J. Place, J. Poole, and R. Sare,

notesStmt.note: English and French in parallel columns.
Running title reads: An exposition of the law-terms.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
